name: Jail
description: Restrict members to only be able to see and type in one channel (nicknamed "jailing").

params.channel: The channel to turn into a jail. If left empty, it will create a new channel called "jail".

errors.JailAlreadyExists: There is already an existing jail system set up. The jail channel is {jail_channel}, and the jail role is {jail_role}.

error.JailNotExists: The jail module has not been properly set up. In order to several commands in the jail module, first run `{prefix}jailcreate`.
